metadata.title: CVE-2013-4271 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The default configuration of the ObjectRepresentation class in Restletbefore 2.1.4 deserializes objects from untrusted sources, which allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary Java code via a serialized object, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2013-4221.

criterions.comment: restlet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
